column4: Question: I want to change the display settings when browsing the file system via firefox for uploading photos. Currently display is a tiny thumbnail that I can't even see, but mainly in list form. I want to be able to make the thumbnail bigger. Any suggestions?
hold ctrl and roll your mouse wheel ;)
I'm on a laptop, so I have no mouse wheel
Thanks... I'll give it a try
its also available in the view menu
Negative on  ctrl, shift, plus symbol
where can I find the view menu
look at the top ofthebrowser...next to edit...
on the photo uploader, there are no menu options at the top the way they typically are in a browser
if its in firefox, its there
view a regular web page and look at the top, a stock firefox hasit
yes, typical firefox browser has it... however the facebook photo uploader does not
the zoom function works on regular sites, but not for increasing thumbnail size on the photo uploader
use the basic uploader, could try the zoom feature in compiz if you use it
